name: Osprey Fairview Trek 70 - Women's
description: With a comfortable, supportive suspension system and travel-tuned internal organization, the Fairview Trek 70 is made specifically for female adventure trekkers who plan to spend a lot of time on-trail. Loads of access points make it easy to organize and get at your stuff, and a handy stowable AirCover deploys to protect your pack from baggage handlers and downpours.Female-friendly fit.Ruggedly built with 420-denier nylon packcloth, with 500-denier reinforced bottom panel.Comfortable edgeless padded mesh straps have 10cm of adjustability.Airspeed adjustable back panel is tensioned mesh, allowing air to circulate against your back.Soft padded mesh hipbelt is designed for heavy loads.Adjustable sternum strap with rescue whistle.Padded tubular side grab handle.Large front panel access for easy packing.Padded laptop sleeve.Vertical quick access pocket on front panel.Zippered lower compartment with removable divider.Zippered top and hipbelt pockets.Stretch-woven side pockets.Compression straps help reduce pack volume.Removable sleeping pad straps.Stowable AirCover protects bag in transit and doubles as a raincover.
